summary: A powerful follower made for a friend of mine, styled after his GF.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][font=impact][color=#101371][size=30]EricaFollower[/size][/color][/font][/u][/center]
[center] A powerful follower.[/center]

[center][i]I created this by request for my friend. It is styled after his girlfriend. Not very accurate though...[/i][/center]

[center]Good for use with mods that add more difficult enemies.[/center]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Contents:[/u][/color][/font][/size]
[list]
[b]-Details[/b]
[b]-Requirements[/b]
[b]-Compatibility[/b]
[b]-Recommendations[/b]
[b]-Feedback[/b]
[/list]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Details:[/u] [/color][/font][/size]
[center]All this mod adds is a female character that spawns in The Drunken Huntsman. She is friendly and uses the voice acting from Lydia's character. She is your Housecarl and you have the option to have her follow you or not. She will go back to [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/The_Drunken_Huntsman]The Drunken Huntsman[/url], or your home if you have one, if she leaves your service. You also have the option to marry her.[/center]
[list]
[b]-Wears [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Elven_Gilded_Armor] Gilded Elven Armor[/url].[/b]
[b]-Has 2 [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Elven_Dagger_(Skyrim)] Elven Daggers[/url]. One has a [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Fire_Damage_(Skyrim)]fire enchantment[/url], and the other has an [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Frost_Damage_(Skyrim)]ice enchantment[/url].[/b]
[b]-Has a torch.[/b]
[b]-Wears a circlet of [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Waterbreathing_(Skyrim)]WaterBreathing[/url].[/b]
[b]-Wears an [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Amulet_of_Mara]Amulet of Mara[/url].[/b]
[b]-Sometimes uses [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Unrelenting_Force]Unrelenting Force[/url] shout.[/b]
[b]-Uses restoration magic.[/b]
[b]-Levels up with player but will always have higher stats.[/b]
[/list]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Requirements: [/u][/color][/font][/size]
[list]
[b]-A legal copy of the game. [/b][center][color=#f60000]SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS OF THE GREATEST GAME OF ALL TIME[/color][/center]
[b]-Must be running latest Skyrim Update.[/b]
[b]-Must have [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?] Apachii Sky Hair [/url] installed.[/b]
[/list]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Compatability: [/u][/color][/font][/size]
[list]
[b]-As far as I know, as long as you meet the mod requirements, there will be no issues.[/b]
[/list]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Recommendations: [/u][/color][/font][/size]
[list]
[b]-I highly recommend you use this mod with other mods that increase difficulty and add more enemies such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5485/?] Deadly Combat [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32597/?] Dragon Combat Overhaul [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41637/?] Swimming Enemies [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35631/?] Monster Mod [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913/?] Immersive Creatures [/url], and[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40491/?] Revenge of the Enemies AI Overhaul[/url]. This is not required, however.[/b]
[b]-That way, your game will not become too easy even when your follower is very powerful.[/b]
[b]-I also recommend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?] Amidianborn's Armor Retexture [/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?] DIMONIZED UNP Female Body Replacer [/url] to make her look nicer. These are also not required.[/b]
[b]-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?] Amazing Follower Tweaks [/url] will greatly improve your follower experience.[/b]
[/list]

[line]

[size=13][font=impact][color=#101371][u]Feedback:[/u][/color][/font][/size]
[list]
[b]-This is my second mod so there may be issues.[/b]
[b]-If you encounter an issue, or have any suggestions, please contact me at [u][color=#b147da]thedrainnoodle@gmail.com[/color][/u][/b]
[b][i][color=#139005]~Thanks, if you like the mod, please endorse.[/color][/i][/b]
[/list]
author: The_Drainnoodle
